review: Had a consultation with Leslie and she was beyond helpful and super nice! She answered all the questions I had and made it super easy to understand. Definitely recommend her services!

Was looking for small business Quickbooks help and came across Leslie online. I had some sessions with her where she showed me the basics and answered any questions that I had. She is professional, responsive, knowledgeable and very helpful. Not only do I feel more confident with my Quickbooks skill set moving forward, I'm glad to have found someone who I feel truly cares about her clients. Her services are highly recommended!
